Name.description: The name of the S3 access point attachment; also used for the name of the S3 access point.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the S3 access point attachment; also used for the name of the S3 access point.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 50  
Pattern: ^(?=[a-z0-9])[a-z0-9-]{1,48}[a-z0-9]$  
Update requires: Replacement

Type.description: The type of Amazon FSx volume that the S3 access point is attached to.
Type.markdownDescription:
The type of Amazon FSx volume that the S3 access point is attached to.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: OPENZFS | ONTAP  
Update requires: Replacement

OntapConfiguration.description: The OntapConfiguration of the S3 access point attachment.
OntapConfiguration.markdownDescription:
The OntapConfiguration of the S3 access point attachment.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

OpenZFSConfiguration.description: The OpenZFSConfiguration of the S3 access point attachment.
OpenZFSConfiguration.markdownDescription:
The OpenZFSConfiguration of the S3 access point attachment.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

S3AccessPoint.description: The S3 access point configuration of the S3 access point attachment.
S3AccessPoint.markdownDescription:
The S3 access point configuration of the S3 access point attachment.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement
Read only property: Yes

VpcId.description: Specifies the virtual private cloud (VPC) for the S3 access point VPC configuration, if one exists.
VpcId.markdownDescription:
Specifies the virtual private cloud (VPC) for the S3 access point VPC configuration, if one exists.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 12  
Maximum Length: 21  
Pattern: ^(vpc-[0-9a-f]{8,})$  
Update requires: No interruption

S3AccessPointVpcConfiguration.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceARN.markdownDescription:
The S3 access point's ARN.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 8  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^arn:[^:]{1,63}:[^:]{0,63}:[^:]{0,63}:(?:|\d{12}):[^/].{0,1023}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Alias.markdownDescription:
The S3 access point's alias.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-z\\-]{1,63}  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcConfiguration.markdownDescription:
The S3 access point's virtual private cloud (VPC) configuration.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption
